Difficulties on one side, resources from all sides.

At present, the epidemic of COVID-19 is outbreaking globally. Epidemic prevention materials in some places are seriously lacking, and they need to be imported from other parts of the world.

At the same time, some medical material manufacturers have not found a corresponding market.

Our website launches this section of "Pandemic Products Information" to facilitate the smooth flow of information for buyers and sellers.

We are not Alibaba. We are the media for supply and demand of epidemic prevention materials.

Friends interested in adding product information to this website can scan the WeChat QR code to add:

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', eval=TRUE, out.width="60%"}
knitr::include_graphics("https://github.com/pzhaonet/ncov/raw/master/static/shared/oe_wechat.png")
```


Or send a message to the mailbox: <original_entropy@163.com>.
